entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
